segments.text: I'm just watching the pure determination on that boy's face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really committed to getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is acting as a lookout, or maybe just an eager recipient.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her hand out, anticipating a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is quite large, almost an oversized treasure chest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so interesting to see how children collaborate on mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're completely focused on their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool, though, it's just about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me worried to see them take such a risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think they're being very stealthy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's actually quite endearing in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an adventure for a few cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR
